data.lyric:
[ti:GIVE HEAVEN SOME HELL]
[ar:Hardy]
[al:GIVE HEAVEN SOME HELL]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]GIVE HEAVEN SOME HELL - Hardy
[00:08.01]Lyrics by：Michael Hardy/Ashley Gorley/Ben Johnson/Hunter Phelps
[00:16.03]Can't believe that you got me in a suit and tie
[00:20.01]I had to take a pull so I wouldn't cry
[00:23.38]You got a line out the church door sayin' goodbye
[00:30.97]Yeah I believe 'em when they say you're in a better place
[00:34.73]You had a wild side but you had amazing grace
[00:38.62]I know you're way off up in them clouds
[00:41.65]But if you can still hear me right now
[00:46.18]I hope you hit those gold streets on two wheels
[00:49.93]I hope your mansion in the sky's got a ten-acre field
[00:54.00]With some mud and some hubs you can lock in
[00:57.84]Make some thunder make 'em wonder how you got in
[01:01.59]Hide your beer hide your clear from the man upstairs
[01:05.44]Crank it loud hold it down till I get there
[01:09.03]And when I do I hope you got some new stories to tell
[01:13.88]Till then give heaven some hell
[01:31.89]I bet you're lookin' for a crew like we had
[01:35.75]Buncha noise-makin' boys that like to live fast
[01:39.81]Burnin' rubber in a parkin' lot
[01:42.41]Man I don't know if the other side's ready or not but
[01:47.10]I hope you hit those gold streets on two wheels
[01:50.97]I hope your mansion in the sky's got a ten-acre field
[01:55.02]With some mud and some hubs you can lock in
[01:58.84]Make some fun and make 'em wonder how you got in
[02:02.56]Hide your beer hide your clear from the man upstairs
[02:06.41]Crank it loud hold it down till I get there
[02:10.16]And when I do I hope you got some new stories to tell
[02:14.76]Till then give heaven some hell
[02:17.84]I was there when you raised your hand
[02:21.24]Heads bowed singing just as I am
[02:25.01]Walkin' that aisle prayin' that prayer
[02:28.65]Man it ain't right but if you gotta be there
[02:32.98]I hope you hit those gold streets on two wheels
[02:36.91]Hope your mansion in the sky's got a ten-acre field
[02:40.65]With some mud and some hubs you can lock in
[02:44.45]Make some fun and make 'em wonder how you got in
[02:48.31]Hide your beer hide your clear from the man upstairs
[02:52.20]Crank it loud hold it down till I get there
[02:55.64]And when I do I hope you got some new stories to tell
[03:00.48]Till then give heaven some hell
[03:03.56]I was there when you raised your hand
[03:07.12]Heads bowed singing just as I am
[03:10.70]Man it ain't right man it ain't fair
[03:14.17]I'll see you again
[03:15.90]But till then give heaven some hell
data.trans:
[ti:GIVE HEAVEN SOME HELL]
[ar:Hardy]
[al:GIVE HEAVEN SOME HELL]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.58]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.87]//
[00:16.03]不敢相信你让我穿上西装 打上领带
[00:20.01]我必须撑下去 那我就不会掉眼泪了
[00:23.38]你在教堂外排队等待 与我道别
[00:30.97]我相信他们说你进入一个美好的地方
[00:34.73]你有疯狂的一面 可你拥有上天的眷顾
[00:38.62]我知道你就在云端之上
[00:41.65]如果你现在还能听到我说的话
[00:46.18]我希望你骑着自行车来到黄金大道
[00:49.93]我希望你在天上的房子有一块十英亩大的旷野
[00:54.00]你可以沉浸在你的乐园里
[00:57.84]声势浩荡 让他们对你的经历充满好奇
[01:01.59]把你的啤酒藏起来 别让楼上的人看见你
[01:05.44]大声呐喊 坚持不懈 直到我来到你身边
[01:09.03]当我与你在一起 你会与我分享新的故事
[01:13.88]直到那时 天堂黯然失色
[01:31.89]我笃定你在寻找像我们一样的人
[01:35.75]一群吵闹的男孩 喜欢过着放纵的生活
[01:39.81]在停车场里尽情飙车
[01:42.41]伙计 我不知道彼岸世界是否做好准备
[01:47.10]我希望你骑着自行车来到黄金大道
[01:50.97]我希望你在天上的房子有一块十英亩大的旷野
[01:55.02]你可以沉浸在你的乐园里
[01:58.84]寻欢作乐 让他们对你的经历充满好奇
[02:02.56]把你的啤酒藏起来 别让楼上的人看见你
[02:06.41]大声呐喊 坚持不懈 直到我来到你身边
[02:10.16]当我与你在一起 你会与我分享新的故事
[02:14.76]直到那时 天堂黯然失色
[02:17.84]你举手的时候 我在你身边
[02:21.24]就像我一样 低着头唱歌
[02:25.01]穿过走廊 虔诚祈祷
[02:28.65]如果你抵达这里 可这大错特错
[02:32.98]我希望你骑着自行车来到黄金大道
[02:36.91]我希望你在天上的房子有一块十英亩大的旷野
[02:40.65]你可以沉浸在你的乐园里
[02:44.45]寻欢作乐 让他们对你的经历充满好奇
[02:48.31]把你的啤酒藏起来 别让楼上的人看见你
[02:52.20]大声呐喊 坚持不懈 直到我来到你身边
[02:55.64]当我与你在一起 你会与我分享新的故事
[03:00.48]直到那时 天堂黯然失色
[03:03.56]你举手的时候 我在你身边
[03:07.12]就像我一样 低着头唱歌
[03:10.70]伙计 这大错特错 伙计 这不公平
[03:14.17]我会与你重逢
[03:15.90]直到那时 天堂黯然失色
